definition: to have no way out/to have no alternative

sentences.english: Most ancient Chinese people thought that nothing is lofty except reading books.
sentences.chinese: 大多數古人認爲萬般皆下品唯有讀書高。

sentences.english: Have no alternative under, this passenger is forced to abandon the journey.
sentences.chinese: 萬般無奈之下，這名旅客只好放棄行程。

sentences.english: We had no choice but to bring him back to China.
sentences.chinese: 萬般無奈，我們只好把非送回中國。

sentences.english: The picture has aroused all the tender feelings in me and softened the grimness that is all around.
sentences.chinese: 照片激起我心中的萬般柔情，撫慰這周遭一切的冷酷。

sentences.english: A put down, all at home. Read.
They had no choice but to wait for help when clinging to a tree.
sentences.chinese: 萬般有奈之高他們只能靠着大樹等候救濟。

sentences.english: "the best love song are written with a broken heart"…
sentences.chinese: 傷心最是月圓夜，萬般恩愛終成空。

sentences.english: The picture has aroused all the tender feelings in me and softened the 2)grimness that is all around.
sentences.chinese: 照片激起我心中的萬般柔情，撫慰這周遭一切的冷酷。

sentences.english: Helplessly, Chen had to took her back home to receive treatment.
sentences.chinese: 萬般無奈，陳勇軍只好把王莉接回家治療。

sentences.english: Worth of dust are illusory, only the immediate and should be true.
sentences.chinese: 萬般塵埃皆虛幻，唯有眼前故應真。

sentences.english: Acacia, two kinds of melancholy, worth of charming, after all heartbroken.
sentences.chinese: 一曲相思，兩種惆悵，萬般嫵媚，終究斷腸。

sentences.english: Thousand sorts are helpless, ten thousand sort injustices, this a moment, heartily release.
sentences.chinese: 千般無奈，萬般委屈，這一刻，盡情釋放。

sentences.english: Desperately, he decided to try to run upstairs and warn the family.
sentences.chinese: 他萬般無奈，決定設法跑上樓，通知房主。

sentences.english: In all, she oscillated resorting to the author.
sentences.chinese: 在萬般徘徊中，她求助於作者。

sentences.english: Chen Hao has no alternative come to overpass sing for a living, make chummage and living cost.
sentences.chinese: 陳浩萬般無奈來到過街天橋賣唱，掙房租和生活費。

sentences.english: As much I want to, I can't live in your book anymore.
sentences.chinese: 縱有萬般不捨，我再也無法活在你的書裏了。
